creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: five-character poem; smaller inscription line at L
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

center: [Beneficent graces permeate the world] (Tokutaku o shoho ni shiku)
markings: Seals URC and LL: [Rinzai Seishu]; [Bukkoku Shujin]; [Seidon]
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych (left)
title: Single-Line Calligraphy (from a triptych of single-line calligraphies)
